name: Prototype Rancour
desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

value.text:
Forged
Adventure Rank 10 Reward
Version 1.2 - Version 2.0 Event: Stellar Reunion
On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by <color=#37ffff>4%/5%/6%/7%/8%</color> for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Lead Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Jueyun Karst is the realm of the mighty and illuminated adepti. But other than the ability to control the elements of the world, Jueyun Karst is also home to three other untold secrets: Alchemy, Sigils, and Sub-Space Creation.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Recruit's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Sergeant's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Primo Elixir
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
An elixir of the highest quality. It embodies a state of intertwining order and chaos, and is said to mirror how the world was when it was first created. Of course, a certain someone knows that this was not the case.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Northlander Sword Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: White Iron Chunk
customize.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

customize.name: Prototype Rancour
customize.desc: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.

customize.text:
<color=#37ffff>Version 1.2 - Version 2.0</color>
Version 1.2: Accumulate 700 points in Homeward Path to obtain Prototype Rancour
Version 1.3 - Version 2.0: Accumulate 500 points in Homeward Path to obtain Prototype Rancour

customize.name: Prototype Archaic
customize.desc: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

customize.name: Prototype Starglitter
customize.desc: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

customize.name: Prototype Amber
customize.desc: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.

customize.name: Prototype Crescent
customize.desc: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

desc.text:
An ancient prototype sword from Liyue's arsenal. The batch number has faded and no records exist to confirm the date of production.
A swirling cloud motif is etched into the body of the blade, which gives it a faint golden glow in the sunlight as it swings through the air.
It is said that the bladesmiths behind this weapon reached the extent of their abilities and were forced to innovate.
Yun Hui, head of the house of Yun's family forge, approached renowned craftsman Han Wu. With the combined expertise from both sides, Han Wu drew up designs for a new series of weapons, simply named "the prototypes."
The very first sword made following this design already had the feel of a formidable weapon.
While trying out the sword at Mt. Tianheng, Han Wu accidentally dropped it on the ground.
The sword responded by unleashing a swirling tornado of energy that cut a twelve-inch-deep hole into the solid mountain rock.
Han Wu took it as a sign from the heavens. He declared, "This sword shall be named Rancour, destroyer of rocks."
This sword shakes mountains at their foundations and possesses the power of a thousand peaks in its tip.
This sword that cuts through rocks like butter became the basis for all subsequent swords made in Liyue.
